name: Humongous Entertainment Game Save File
summary: Learn about .SG0 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SG0 files are used by Humongous Entertainment games that use the Script Utility for Maniac Mansion (SCUMM) engine. The file is located with other game data files in the saved game directory path.

description: Game file created and used by Humongous Entertainment games, such as Backyard Baseball and the Pajama Sam series; stores saved progress of your game; referenced by the game when continuing a saved game.
